member.name: T:TehPers.FishingOverhaul.Api.Content.AvailabilityInfo
member.summary: Information about the availability of a catchable item.
member.param: The base chance this will be caught. This is not a percentage chance, but rather a weight relative to all available entries.

member.name: M:TehPers.FishingOverhaul.Api.Content.AvailabilityInfo.#ctor(System.Double)
member.summary: Information about the availability of a catchable item.
member.param: The base chance this will be caught. This is not a percentage chance, but rather a weight relative to all available entries.

member.name: P:TehPers.FishingOverhaul.Api.Content.AvailabilityInfo.StartTime
member.summary: Time this becomes available (inclusive).

member.name: P:TehPers.FishingOverhaul.Api.Content.AvailabilityInfo.EndTime
member.summary: Time this is no longer available (exclusive).

member.name: P:TehPers.FishingOverhaul.Api.Content.AvailabilityInfo.SeasonsSplit
member.summary: Used for JSON serialization. Prefer .

member.name: P:TehPers.FishingOverhaul.Api.Content.AvailabilityInfo.Seasons
member.summary: Seasons this can be caught in.

member.name: P:TehPers.FishingOverhaul.Api.Content.AvailabilityInfo.WeathersSplit
member.summary: Used for JSON serialization. Prefer .

member.name: P:TehPers.FishingOverhaul.Api.Content.AvailabilityInfo.Weathers
member.summary: Weathers this can be caught in.

member.name: P:TehPers.FishingOverhaul.Api.Content.AvailabilityInfo.WaterTypesSplit
member.summary: Used for JSON serialization. Prefer .

member.name: P:TehPers.FishingOverhaul.Api.Content.AvailabilityInfo.WaterTypes
member.summary: The type of water this can be caught in. Each location handles this differently.

member.name: P:TehPers.FishingOverhaul.Api.Content.AvailabilityInfo.MinFishingLevel
member.summary: Required fishing level to see this.

member.name: P:TehPers.FishingOverhaul.Api.Content.AvailabilityInfo.MaxFishingLevel
member.summary: Maximum fishing level required to see this, or null for no max.

member.name: P:TehPers.FishingOverhaul.Api.Content.AvailabilityInfo.IncludeLocations
member.summary: List of locations this should be available in. Leaving this empty will make this available everywhere. Some locations have special handling. For example, the mines use the location names "UndergroundMine" and "UndergroundMine/N", where N is the floor number (both location names are valid for the floor).

member.name: P:TehPers.FishingOverhaul.Api.Content.AvailabilityInfo.ExcludeLocations
member.summary: List of locations this should not be available in. This takes priority over .

member.name: P:TehPers.FishingOverhaul.Api.Content.AvailabilityInfo.Position
member.summary: Constraints on the position of the bobber in the map when fishing.

member.name: P:TehPers.FishingOverhaul.Api.Content.AvailabilityInfo.When
member.summary: Content Patcher conditions for when this is available.

member.name: M:TehPers.FishingOverhaul.Api.Content.AvailabilityInfo.GetWeightedChance(TehPers.FishingOverhaul.Api.FishingInfo)
member.summary: Gets the weighted chance of this being caught, if any. This does not test the conditions in .
member.param: Information about the farmer that is fishing.
member.returns: The weighted chance of this being caught, or if not available.

member.name: T:TehPers.FishingOverhaul.Api.Content.CatchActions
member.summary: Actions to be executed on catch.

member.name: P:TehPers.FishingOverhaul.Api.Content.CatchActions.CustomEvents
member.summary: Raise custom events with this name to notify SMAPI mods that this was caught. Event key format is "namespace:key" (for example "TehPers.FishingOverhaul:GoldenWalnut").

member.summary: Sets one or more mail flags.

member.summary: Sets one or more quests as active.

member.summary: Adds mail entries to the player's mail tomorrow.

member.name: P:TehPers.FishingOverhaul.Api.Content.CatchActions.StartConversations
member.summary: Starts conversations. The key is the conversation ID and the value is the number of days.

member.name: M:TehPers.FishingOverhaul.Api.FishingInfo.GetDefaultLocationNames(StardewValley.GameLocation)
member.summary:
Gets the location names associated with a . Some locations have names in addition to their normal names:
"UndergroundMine/#", where # is the floor number.
"Farm/X", where X is one of "Standard", "Riverland", "Forest", "Hills", "Wilderness", or "FourCorners". Only vanilla farms have this name.
"Island".
member.param: The location to get the names of.
member.returns: The location's names.

member.summary: Gets the fish from a at the given tile if possible.
